description: Arithmetic mean of digits of n (rounded up).
comments: a(100)=1 is the first value that differs from the variant "... rounded to the nearest integer". - _M. F. Hasler_, May 10 2015
links: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..25000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
prog: (PARI) A004427(n)=ceil(sum(i=1, #n=digits(n), n[i])/#n) \\ ...Vecsmall(Str(n))...-48 is a little faster. \\ _M. F. Hasler_, May 10 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
